flawed_nl_solution:
Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is 10-3=<<10-3=7>>7 trumpets.
Two more guitars than he has hands is 2+2=<<2+2=7>>7 guitars.
Two more trombones than he has heads is 2+1=<<2+1=3>>3 trombones.
And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is 7-1=<<7-1=6>>6 French horns.
Altogether, Miles owns 7+7+3+6=<<7+7+3+6=23>>23 musical instruments.
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
